articles.title: From vibrant to dual-tone, Alia Bhatt's sarees for RARKPK promotions are bookmark worthy - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Alia Bhatt decked up in the most beautiful drapes created by Manish Malhotra for the promotions of 'Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani'.
articles.content: Alia Bhatt, who is busy with promotions of her upcoming film 'Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani' with Ranveer Singh, is acing Desi Girl looks in Manish Malhotra's sarees at the promotional events.
